description.value: You shroud yourself in ashes that hide the vital essence sought by life-sensing undead. You're always taking precautions when @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Avoid Notice]{Avoiding Notice}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Hide]{Hiding}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Sneak]{Sneaking} to foil lifesense, and you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed] to any creature using only precise lifesense to observe you.

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall
